apps.name: Bike Race
apps.description:
App Store Game of the Year in selected countries. 100+ MILLION USERS!

Drive your bike through amazing tracks with jumps and loops in this simple and fast-paced physics-based game.

Multiplayer! Challenge your Facebook friends.

Tilt your device to lean your bike and touch the screen to accelerate/brake.

Features:
- Single and multiplayer modes
- Earn stars to unlock new levels 
- Dozen addictive worlds
- Hundreds of challenging tracks 
- Simple controls

apps.name: Racing Penguin
apps.description:
Racing Penguin (or Flying Penguin) is a physics based slide and fly game!

Slide down the mountains of Antarctica and flap your wings to fly.

Go as fast as you can to escape from the polar bear.

5 addicting worlds, 40 racing levels.

Clear levels to earn stars - the faster you go, the more stars you get.

Use your stars to unlock new worlds!

Multiplayer! You can challenge your friends!

Get it while it is FREE!

‚óè What our players are saying

- If it where a $10 game I would buy it. I can play it everyday for the rest of my life

- This is the funnest mobile game in the history of mobile games

- This game was so much fun I lost my job and my wife left me. I sure hope they will reimburse me for my life.

- Fantabulous. Hide this one from the kids, you're gonna want to spend some quality
time playing this one yourself

- This game changed my life

apps.name: Mouse Maze
apps.description:
Get it while it's FREE

Mouse Maze is the new puzzle game by the creators of the #1 top downloaded game Racing Penguin

Help the cute mouse eat all the cheese in the maze before those evil cats get him!

+ Tons of levels with EXCITING MAZES and PUZZLES
+ EASY CONTROLS: touch the screen and the mouse will follow your finger
+ Collect all those CUTE CHARACTERS
+ Drink the magic potion to knock-out the evil cats
+ PLAY WITH FRIENDS and compare your scores in the leaderboard


~*~ Checkout what our users are saying about thiss free puzzle game ~*~

apps.name: Top Quiz
apps.description:
Challenge your friends on the greatest Quiz game! Invite your friends and choose the category to beat them! 

Be the fastest and smartest Trivia player on CELEBRITIES, SPORTS, LOGOS and much more! Play with Images and Words.

** FEATURES 
- Asynchronous multiplayer
- Play against your Friends or random buddies
- Weekly tournaments
- Invite your facebook friends 
- Several types of categories and quizzes
- Win and get coins to get more categories and special items!

apps.name: Spider Monkey
apps.description:
Spider Monkey is the new physics based game from the creators of #1 iPhone FREE APP Racing Penguin, rated 5 stars! 

Touch the trees to grab them. Use your arms to jump from one tree to the other. Grab stars to unlock new levels 

Features 

+ Simple touch controls 
+ Physics based 
+ 4 worlds and 32 levels 
+ Touch to grab the trees and touch again to release it! 

Get it while it is FREE!

apps.name: Where's My Head?
apps.description:
Slice the rope to solve the puzzles in this awesome physics based game. from the creators of #1 iPhone FREE APP Racing Penguin, rated 5 stars! 

Features: 

+simple control 
+swipe and cut the rope 
+realistic physics 
+120 different puzzles 
+amazing graphics
